name: Online Circle Pong
description: It's like a ping-pong, but in circle! It's like a ping-pong, but online! It's like a ping-pong, but up to 15 players at same match!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Radeon R7 series with 1Gb memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core I7 4790 Memory: 8096 MB RAM Graphics: Radeon R9 series with 2Gb memory DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space
